properties.areaDesc: Outer Saginaw Bay SW of Alabaster to Port Austin MI to Inner Saginaw Bay; Lake Huron from Port Austin to Harbor Beach 5NM Off Shore to the US/Canadian border; Port Austin to Harbor Beach MI; Inner Saginaw Bay SW of Point Au Gres to Bay Port MI; Lake Huron from Sturgeon Point to Alabaster MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 3:52PM EST until January 12 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 34 knots from the north
with gusts up to 45 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 16 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 23 feet.

* WHERE...Saginaw Bay And Central Lake Huron.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 11 PM EST
Saturday with the largest waves expected around 1 AM EST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wintry mix of precipitation and freezing
spray continues through tonight.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST SUNDAY
